about_the_game:
In the 1700s, Jonhatan Sauvage, a powerful, megalomaniac lord, made a pact with the devil. This pact allows him to summon powerful creatures born of dangerous rumors running through his lands, but consuming his soul. With his people terrorized, he and his mercenaries come to their rescue, winning gold and glory in the process.



Blood Lust is a student project created by a team of 17 students in their 2nd year at the Interactive Art and Design school from Montpellier. The purpose was to create a Brawl Stars-like game in around 3 months, inspired by “Highwaymen” in a stylized theme.
7 environmental / props artists, 3 chara designers and 7 game designers / level designers / gameplay programmer / sound designers / quality assurance.
It was decided to speed up the game and add unique mechanics to each map. The game uses the steam network to allow players from all over the world to fight against each other.



  • Play up to 6 characters with unique skills, 3 creatures and 3 mercenaries.

  • Choose from 4 different maps with their variants in a total of 12 maps!

  • Fight alone against your friends in a free-for-all mode and try to get more kills than them! You can also add bots to play up to 4 players!

  • Team up and create 2vs2 or 1vs2 / 1vs3 games to show off your teams' skills.

  • Take a break from the violence and try to hide and survive in Hide & Seek mode from the bloodthirsty Warabouc.

  • Try out each character in training mode to test and understand their skills.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 family 64 bits
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3400G with Radeon Vega Graphics 3.7GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Fight against your friends in this multiplayer arena combat game and choose between different characters with occult skills.
